meanings.sent1: The econometricians analyzed the economic data to make predictions.
meanings.sent2: Many econometricians work for government agencies or research institutions.
meanings.sent3: The econometricians joked that they could predict the future of the stock market.
meanings.sent4: She was like an econometrician, always analyzing patterns in the data of her daily life.
meanings.sent5: The group of econometricians formed a team to tackle the complex economic models.

meanings.definition: The study or practice of econometrics.
meanings.sent1: Econometricians use statistical methods to analyze economic relationships.
meanings.sent2: The university offers a course on econometrics for students interested in the field.
meanings.sent3: Studying econometrics can be challenging but rewarding for aspiring economists.
meanings.sent4: Her mind worked like the field of econometrics, always seeking to find patterns in chaos.
meanings.sent5: The textbook on econometrics provided a comprehensive guide for students learning the subject.
